definition: to rely on/to base oneself on
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of

sentences.english: The humans who can fight these demons are known as exorcists.
sentences.chinese: 可是惡魔能憑依於相當的物質從而進入人類的世界。

sentences.english: I lean against the railing, staring at the firefly.
sentences.chinese: 我憑依欄杆，細看那螢火蟲。

sentences.english: It is dependent on weather conditions and bodily conditions.
sentences.chinese: 覺得也是憑依天氣和身體的狀況的。
